questions.title: Two Sum
questions.description: Find indices of two numbers in an array that add up to a specific target.

questions.title: Roman to Integer
questions.description: Convert a Roman numeral string to its integer value.

questions.title: Valid Parentheses
questions.description: Determine if the input string has valid matching parentheses.

questions.title: Same Tree
questions.description: Check if two binary trees are identical in structure and node values.

questions.title: Symmetric Tree
questions.description: Determine if a binary tree is symmetric around its center.

questions.title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
questions.description: Find the maximum profit from buying and selling a stock once.

questions.title: Diameter of Binary Tree
questions.description: Find the diameter (longest path) of a binary tree.

questions.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
questions.description: Find the longest substring in a given string that is a palindrome.

questions.title: String to Integer (atoi)
questions.description: Convert a string to a 32-bit signed integer following specific parsing rules.

questions.title: Integer to Roman
questions.description: Convert an integer to its corresponding Roman numeral representation.

questions.title: Valid Sudoku
questions.description: Check if a 9x9 Sudoku board is valid according to Sudoku rules.

questions.title: Combination Sum
questions.description: Find all unique combinations in an array that sum up to a target value.

questions.title: Permutations
questions.description: Generate all possible permutations of a list of numbers.

questions.title: Merge Intervals
questions.description: Merge all overlapping intervals in a list of intervals.

questions.title: Rotate List
questions.description: Rotate a linked list to the right by k places.

questions.title: Minimum Path Sum
questions.description: Find the minimum sum path from top-left to bottom-right in a grid.

questions.title: Word Search
questions.description: Determine if a given word exists in a grid of letters by traversing adjacent cells.

questions.title: Validate Binary Search Tree
questions.description: Verify if a binary tree is a valid binary search tree (BST).

questions.title: Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
questions.description: Return the level order traversal of a binary tree's nodes' values.

questions.title: Convert Sorted List to Binary Search Tree
questions.description: Convert a sorted singly linked list to a height-balanced BST.

questions.title: Populating Next Right Pointers in Each Node
questions.description: Populate each next pointer to point to its next right node in a perfect binary tree.

questions.title: LRU Cache
questions.description: Design and implement a Least Recently Used (LRU) cache.

questions.title: Min Stack
questions.description: Design a stack that supports push, pop, top, and retrieving the minimum element in constant time.

questions.title: Number of Islands
questions.description: Count the number of islands in a 2D grid representing land and water.

questions.title: Course Schedule
questions.description: Determine if all courses can be finished given their prerequisites.

questions.title: Course Schedule II
questions.description: Return the order in which courses should be taken to finish all courses.

questions.title: Add and Search Word - Data structure design
questions.description: Design a data structure to add words and search for them with support for wildcard characters.

questions.title: Game of Life
questions.description: Simulate the Game of Life rules on a given board.
